remarks: Membership in a shifted interval.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)
statement:
iccshftli.1 $e |- A e. RR $.
iccshftli.2 $e |- B e. RR $.
iccshftli.3 $e |- R e. RR $.
iccshftli.4 $e |- ( A - R ) = C $.
iccshftli.5 $e |- ( B - R ) = D $.
iccshftli $p |- ( X e. ( A [,] B ) -> ( X - R ) e. ( C [,] D ) ) $.
